attributes.additional_details:
We petition that government and parliament  refrain from passing any propaganda/counter propaganda  budget on any issue and that any current propaganda budgets to the BBC or others be closed.
Much time and public funding has been spent on promoting Media ethics, which is inconsistent with Parliament effectively stating, however, if we pay you to misrepresent fact with our propaganda /counter propaganda budget, that is acceptable.
It should be an offence for any MP to misrepresent any fact to the media or electorate. The electorate are entitled to be acquainted with fact and transparency at all times.
